text:
September 1, J$66
Mr. Frank Rushtan, Jr.
P.0. Box 3S5
Fort Rucker, Alabama 3636Q
Dear Mr. Rushton:
I want first to apologise far the delay in answering
your letter regarding the names of NAEB officers in
the Southeastern Region. Unfortunately, your letter
only now reached my desk after circulating among several
departments for almost a month.
I hope we are not too late in informing you that Mrs.
Marjorie Newman, Program Director of NFSU-FM at Florida
State University, is Chairman of the Region H Council.
For your information, the Region II Conference has been
scheduled for March 2-4, 1367, at the Robert Mayer Hotel
in Jacksonville, Florida. In the event that you wish to
contact Mrs. Newman, she way be reached at Florida State
at 116 Music Building, Tallahassee, Florida 32306.
Again my apologies far our delay. If there Is anything
further with which we can provide you, please do let me
know.
Thank you.
I
Sincerely,
Sondra Olson
Membership Associate
